ref: 4776 cikura1 m. ʻ hair of head ʼ Gīt., ʻ hair of a chowry ʼ Bālar., cikūra -- lex., cihura -- lex.
Pk. ciura -- , cihura -- m. ʻ hair of head ʼ;
N. ciuri ʻ a plant from which fibre is obtained, Sterculia coxinia ʼ (cf. cikura -- 2);
H. poet. cihur m. ʻ hair of head ʼ;
M. civar, cĩv˚ n. ʻ fibre surrounding pulp of breadfruit ʼ.
